jcr:content.jcr:title: Pro - Dewey
jcr:content.searchTitle: Pro Mechanical Gaming Keyboard Designed for Esports Professionals.
jcr:content.seoDescription: Logitech G Pro Gaming Keyboard is a tenkeyless mechanical keyboard built for Esports, with fast Romer-G switches, programmable RGB lighting & compact design.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G Pro Tenkeyless Mechanical Gaming Keyboard

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: G903 is the Logitech G answer for the most advanced and full-featured gaming mouse in the world. Featuring 1 ms LIGHTSPEED wireless, G903 delivers competition-level responsiveness and accuracy. Combined with POWERPLAY, G903 performs wirelessly with infinite power, never needing a charging cable.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: The first Logitech G keyboard to carry the name PRO is designed and built to the exacting standards of the worldâ€™s top esports athletes. Engineered for extreme performance and designed to win.

copyblock.mainTitle: LOGITECH G PRO GAMING KEYBOARD - ESPORT PRO
LOGITECH G PRO GAMING KEYBOARD- TSM
HOW THE PRO GAMING KEYBOARD IS ENGINEERED FOR WINNING
LOGITECH G PRO GAMING KEYBOARD OVERVIEW

copyblock.mainDescription: Romer-G Tactile mechanical switches are purpose-built for pro-grade performance, responsiveness and durability. The Romer-G Tactile variant in PRO is a perfect blend of fast, precise and quiet while still maintaining a discernible, tactile actuation feel.

media_tile.altText: Graph: Romer-G Mechanical Switch - 5 ms Actuation Time, Standard Mech. Switch - 6.7 ms
media_tile.text: Romer-G is a completely custom design with enhancements specifically for gaming. The short-throw 1.5mm actuation and low-force 45g actuation point is 25% faster than the competition's standard mechanical switches.

media_tile_copy.text: Romer-G switches feature dual contact points so each actuation establishes a robust signal with incredible reliability. This virtually eliminates mechanical switch errors like double clicks and ensures lasting precision.

media_tile_copy_copy.text: Romer-G switches are meticulously tested by Logitech G engineers to ensure each switch lasts for 70 million keystrokes. And, each of those 70 million strokes are just as quick and consistent as the first.

copyblock.mainDescription: PRO features a detachable cable and compact tenkeyless design. The smaller footprint and separate cable makes it easy to throw in a bag. The compact design gives you extra tournament table space for low-sens mouse movement and more flexibility to orient the keyboard at your desired angle. Durability is built into every component and reinforced by a super-strong steel backplate that also adds stability and rigidity during gameplay.

Keystroke Signal Processing, or KSP improves total performance by managing each step of the sequence from switch actuation to USB signal. To make PRO ultra responsive, weâ€™ve optimized our KSP to be up to 10ms faster response than the competition.

Multi-key input means complex moves can be executed exactly right every time. With 26-key rollover, simultaneously pressing almost any number of keys, plus modifier keys (Control, Alt, Shift), in any order results in exactly what you intended.

LIGHTSYNC RGB technology provides next-gen RGB lighting that synchronizes lighting and game profiles with your content. Customize from a full spectrum of approximately 16.8 million colors and synchronize lighting animations and effects with your other Logitech G devices. Customize it all quickly and easily using Logitech Gaming Software.
Donâ€™t lose that $1m match because you fat-fingered the Windows key. Use Logitech Gaming Software to customize game mode to disable any keys you donâ€™t need.

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: G603 wireless gaming mouse delivers up to 500 hours on 2 AA batteriesâ€”twice as long as our previous generation. Even with a single battery the G603 can last through up to 500 matches of League of LegendsÂ®. When battery is at 15%, both LED status indicator and Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) will notify you before the critical moment. You can also choose which side to place a single battery, for custom balancing.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: Use Logitech Gaming Software to program custom button macros on F1-F12 to make your life easier. Execute complex commands, or unleash a timed series of actions or spells with the press of a button. Profile settings require LGS. Keyboard macros are generally not allowed in tournaments.

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: G603 wireless gaming mouse delivers up to 500 hours on 2 AA batteriesâ€”twice as long as our previous generation. Even with a single battery the G603 can last through up to 500 matches of League of LegendsÂ®. When battery is at 15%, both LED status indicator and Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) will notify you before the critical moment. You can also choose which side to place a single battery, for custom balancing.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: Three step angle adjustments allows you to set your keyboard to 0, 4, or 8 degrees for the perfect angle. Rubber feet keep your keyboard stable during intense gaming action.
